DOC.brief_summary: An observational study perform subject age 3-65 year old describe dynamic change cellular immunity vaccination hepatitis B vaccine , find expression level Th9 cell IL9 subject different response primary immunization ( 3 single -dose injunction ) .
DOC.brief_title: Expression Th9 Cells Poor/Non-responsiveness Hepatitis B Vaccination
DOC.detailed_description: This study select 74 volunteer hepatitis B vaccine ( immunization program 0,1,6 ) , anti-HBs≤10mIU research subject , choose 20 volunteer anti-HBs≥1000mIU control group , revaccination group accord normal immunization program , blood sample would collect 7th day , separate PBMC detect expression level Th9 cell IL9 FCM , try find effect Th9 IL9 non/poor -responsiveness subject hepatitis B .
DOC.criteria: volunteer 360 year old healthy history vaccination hepatitis B . Recent serological test result show HBsAg , HBeAg , antiHBe , antiHBc , HBV DNA PreS1 negative . informed consent allergic component vaccine
